entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
